name: StopwatchDeluxe
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stop watch
des:
Simple to use Stop Watch with pause function.

You can start and stop the clock by saying:

"Alexa, open stop watch" or "Alexa, Stop Watch."
(do NOT say: "Alexa, start a stop watch". This will not work)

The elapsed time is shown in hours, minutes and seconds. 

Additionaly to the Alexa voice the Skill will show an historic picture of an old time-measurement device in the Alexa App, your Alexa Spot or on your Alexa Show.

"Alexa, ask stop watch for current measurement"
Will tell you the elapsed time.

Happy time keeping :-)
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
